item.title: Why Young Americans Dread Turning 26: Health Insurance Chaos
item.description: Young adults without jobs that provide insurance find their options are limited and expensive. The problem is about to get worse.

item.title: A Guide to Finding Insurance at 26‌
item.description: It’s a difficult rite of passage for young adults without job-based insurance. Here are some tips for getting started.

item.title: Inside the CDC, Shooting Adds to Trauma as Workers Describe Projects, Careers in Limbo

item.title: Journalists Talk Medicaid Work Rule Logistics and Colon Cancer Increase Among Young Adults
item.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.
